ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopni.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_blssopn | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ran ( ball ` D ) C_ J ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR* ) -> ran ( ball ` D ) C_ J ) |
| 4 |  | #P_blelrn | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. ran ( ball ` D ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. J ) |
